lines.text: Well, whatever we make, we just put it in the bank, and... when we need money we just... take it out again.
Well, then at the end of the year we... see if there's anything left... well, if there's anything left it's swell!
Pat... you ain't looking for him, are you?
Well, he's over at the bunkhouse trying to beautify himself.
But it ain't doin' no good.
Well, what do you know! I forgot to put milk out for the cat.
Are you crazy? We ain't got no cat.
Oh. Well, why waste the milk? I'll go bring it in.
